extendedInfo.description: It is a top free game for girls and kid in app market. Dress up and design your fairy with lots to choose from!This interactive fairy dressup apps provides endless hours of fashion fun with its animated scenes loaded with colorful effects and engaging interactions. With amazing high-quality illustrations, it's just like dressing up a real fairy! And you can save your fairy dress up to your device! Show off your fashion skills and imagination by mixing and matching dress, shoes, accessories and moreDress up your own Fairy!+Regular updates! Unique content added with each and every one of them!+No Internet connection required! Play wherever and whenever you want!+Lots of unique accecories and hairstyles.+Crazy clothes dressup combinations make your fairy even more lovely+save your fairy to your device and share with friendsParents and kids are our best reviewers and help us create and improve our apps.We always welcome your suggestions, comments and thoughts. If you have a moment, feel free to rate and review our app.==============================================To make this app free, we use advertisement which will sit on top of the apps..feel free to tap on it, if it's interesting..And we use appbrain, which will shown when you close the app..==============================================Any CAPS (Comments, Abuse, Praise, and Suggestion) always welcome, write here or you can email us at ++ mariomaradona90@gmail.com ++-|| Our Games built with cocos2d-x (www.cocos2d-x.org), the great Framework Engine for both Android and Iphone ||-
